A

acceptClient() - Method in class server.Server
The acceptClient function is responsible for accepting new clients and adding them to the clientList.

B

broadcastClientList() - Method in class server.Server
The broadcastClientList function is used to send a list of all the users currently connected to the server to each client.
broadcastMessage(JSONObject) - Method in class server.Server
The broadcastMessage function sends a message to all clients connected to the server.

C

Client - Class in server
The Client class which stores user variables and allows communication by giving stream interface.
Client(Socket, String) - Constructor for class server.Client
The Client constructor takes in a Socket object and a String username, and creates an instance of the Client class with those parameters.

D

deleteClientByName(String) - Method in class server.Server
The deleteClientByName function removes a client from the server's list of clients.

G

getAllClients() - Method in class server.Server
The getAllClients function returns a list of all clients connected to the server.
getClientByName(String) - Method in class server.Server
The getClientByName function takes a String username as an argument and returns the Client object that has that username.
getClientId() - Method in class server.Client
The getClientId function returns the clientId of the current instance of Client.
getInputStream() - Method in class server.Client
The getInputStream function returns the input stream of the client.
getOutStream() - Method in class server.Client
The getOutStream function returns the PrintStream object that is used to send data to the server.
getProperty(String) - Method in class utils.Property
The getProperty function returns the value of a property from the mainProperties object.
getUserName() - Method in class server.Client
The getUserName function returns the username of the client.

I

isSocketClosed() - Method in class server.Client
The isSocketClosed function checks to see if the socket is closed.

P

Property - Class in utils
The Property class is used to read server properties form file *.properties and enable to read them.
Property(String) - Constructor for class utils.Property
The Property constructor is used to read the properties file.

R

Receiver - Class in server
The Receiver class is a thread that runs in the background of the server. It listens for incoming messages from clients and then sends them to be processed by the Server class.
Receiver(Server, Client) - Constructor for class server.Receiver
The Receiver constructor to assign client and server variable.
run() - Method in class server.Receiver
 

S

server - package server
 
Server - Class in server
The Server class is used to create the server and accept incoming connections from clients. When a connection is made, the Server function will create a new thread to handle that client's requests.
Server(int) - Constructor for class server.Server
The Server constructor is assign a value to the PORT variable.
startServerSocket() - Method in class server.Server
The startServerSocket function creates a new ServerSocket object, which is used to accept incoming client connections.

U

utils - package utils
